reviews.review: oh yes dis game is great
Un classique, je recommande fortement car en plus de 10 ans le jeu a gardé la meme saveur qu'au debut !
O jogo é bom pra se divertir com seus amigos. Não jogue sério você pode ficar estressado :P
Se jeux est super bien plein de serveurs différents tester et vous verrez

Легенда однозначно, но играл без нон стима, с друзьями=) такое себе. Лучше сразу в ксго переходить=) не советую играть в 2021.

This is a very good shooting game,There are a lot of details that CSGO can't do,maybe these details affect the game,for example, shell casings are thrown and left in place,but does that affect vision?I think the answer is "NO",from the details to the feel,Valve did very well.
That's why I prefer CSS, right.....If you think CS:GO is boring,you can try this game,and play with me
There's still time for us all to return to the Source.
CS:GO'dan daha kaliteli bir oyun olduğunu söyleyebilirim tek tük de olsa Türk sunucuları var oynamanızı şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum
Games a great laugh with friends, and bots make it possible to practice when you have none

Sinceramente al 1.6 le tengo mucho cariño pero ay que admitir que el source sería un 1.7 del clásico, las granadas mejoran el procesador source mejora muchas características del juego de echo si lo jugas en todo en alto parece el csgo, yo lo jugaba en mí net del gobierno y me lo corría a 75 fps en bajo lo recomiendo al 100%, igualmente el 1,6 es clave

говно ебаная steam версия вылетает, багует , кладет серваки, блядь серверов пиздец мало нормальных. Большинство какую-ту хуйню на серваки установили так там ERROR ебанный вместо модельки, шлак полный .

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
so here is the good stuff and bad
-GOOD
better than csgo
easier recoil
more memories
more fun to play with friends
more guns
not toxic
-BAD
alot of bugs in inferno ect boxes
horrible aming with m4m1-s 
to new people that only has 10 hrs on this game (haha who do you think it is) its really hard to buy guns
super easy people playing 
super easy achivements
some guns will just go straight up when you shoot
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

but in general great classic game
пиздатая игра, не плохая графика относительно цены. Советую.
if not for bhop servers, this game would be dead

Une gestion de la plateforme complètement nulle. Steam est une plateforme qui ne sait pas gérer ses jeux, 3 fois sur 5 il y a incapacité de jouer à cause de déconnexion en heure de pointe. Apex, CS, Albion, CSGO, j'en passe. Perte de temps, temps de jeu réduit et aucune aide.

I grew up with this game.... 
was one of my first shooter
simply a classic game
игра для дедов. раздал пару хедшотов и зажал в смок, сделал килл. сразу после этого бан навсегда. я не виноват, если я хорошо играю.

This Garry's Mod DLC is really fun!


Jokes aside, I've had fun in this game, and still do. If you make it so all bots join one team and then make them use knives, you have bootleg zombie mode, which I've spent a long time with my friend playing.

The actual game is just like the original Counter-Strike with a source face-lift. Not saying that's bad though, because the updated engine has its own quirks to have fun with. Would I recommend now? Hell yeah.
very nice game <3 i love this game

ну  классная стрелялка что тут сказать
Ganz nettes Spiel. An die erfolgreichen Zeiten von Counter-Strike 1.6 und GO kommt dieses Spiel, allerdings lange nicht dran.

CS Source was my first ever game in my Steam account back in 2007. Still love playing it!

Not much to say, most people know about this game so why should I describe it any further :) Play it if you want an oldschool fps game. I came from cs:go and played it just for fun and it actually is very fun. I highly recommend it if you like cs:go and oldschool games.
el juego es muy bueno, tiene mapas bueno, puedes jugar con bots, etc, bale la pena comprarlo
